page.title: 01Introducing Our Block
page.content: Our 'D' block is located to the{NORTH {WEST}of{SWANSEA.}The{landscape}is undulating,the highest point being Garngoch Common and the lowest point is at Cadle where there is a bridge over the River Llan. The east side of our block is residential,much of the{housing}is provided by the Local Authority.The south west corner is built up too.In the centre of the area there are factories,many of which are closed.The remainder of the land is farmland or roughland. Many of the{place names}are Welsh e.g. Waunarlwydd.........The Lord's Meadow Garngoch............Red Hill Cadle...............Place of battle Blaen-y-maes........First Plain Fforestfach.........Little Forest
